channel.title: SMF 78 Subtype 2 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 78 Subtype 2 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - asl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78ASL

item.title: Field - asn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78ASN

item.title: Field - ass
item.description: Offset to data section R781DS (subtype 1) R782PVT (subtype 2) R783DS (subtype 3) Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78ASS

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF78S2 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78DAT

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78DTE

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF SECTION Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78DCL

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF SECTIONS Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78DCN

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: Offset to configuration section R781CS (subtype 1), data section R782COMN (subtype 2) or configuration section R783CS (subtype 3) Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78DCS

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78DTE

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF78S2 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. rch 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78GIE

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78IET

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78INT

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78IST

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78LGO

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78MFV

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78MVS

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF78S2 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78PRN

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78PRS

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78PTN

item.title: Field - qdl
item.description: Length of IOQ global section Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78QDL

item.title: Field - qdn
item.description: Number of IOQ global section Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78QDN

item.title: Field - qds
item.description: Offset to IOQ global section Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78QDS

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF78PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - r782actv
item.description: 1: JOB ACTIVE AT START OF INTERVAL Map: R782PVT Based on: r782flgs Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r782flgs.

item.title: Field - r782ca
item.description: CSA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782CA

item.title: Field - r782cs
item.description: CSA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782CS

item.title: Field - r782eca
item.description: EXTENDED CSA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ECA

item.title: Field - r782ecs
item.description: EXTENDED CSA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ECS

item.title: Field - r782efla
item.description: EFLPA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782EFLA

item.title: Field - r782efls
item.description: EFLPA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782EFLS

item.title: Field - r782elpa
item.description: EXTENDED PLPA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ELPA

item.title: Field - r782elpi
item.description: INTERMODULE SPACE IN ELPA Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ELPI

item.title: Field - r782elps
item.description: EXTENDED PLPA ASIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ELPS

item.title: Field - r782emla
item.description: EXTENDED MLPA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782EMLA

item.title: Field - r782emls
item.description: EXTENDED MLPA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782EMLS

item.title: Field - r782emr
item.description: MAXIMUM USER REGION ABOVE 16M Map: R782COMN Based on: R782EMR

item.title: Field - r782ena
item.description: EXTENDED NUCLEUS ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ENA

item.title: Field - r782enl
item.description: NON-ACCESSIBLE EPLPA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ENL

item.title: Field - r782ens
item.description: EXTENDED NUCLEUS SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ENS

item.title: Field - r782epa
item.description: EXTENDED PRIVATE AREA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782EPA

item.title: Field - r782eps
item.description: EXTENDED PRIVATE AREA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782EPS

item.title: Field - r782eruca
item.description: EXTENDED RUCSA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ERUCA

item.title: Field - r782erucs
item.description: EXTENDED RUCSA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ERUCS

item.title: Field - r782esa
item.description: EXTENDED SQA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ESA

item.title: Field - r782ess
item.description: EXTENDED SQA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782ESS

item.title: Field - r782fla
item.description: FLPA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782FLA

item.title: Field - r782flg
item.description: FLAGS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r782rucd 0 =1 Restricted Use CSA (RUCSA) is defined

item.title: Field - r782flgs
item.description: Flags Map: R782PVT Based on: R782FLGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r782actv 0 1: JOB ACTIVE AT START OF INTERVAL r782term 1 1: JOB TERMINATED DURING INTERVAL r782glch 2 1: GETMAIN LIMIT CHANGED DURING INTERVAL r782invl 3 1: DATA INVALID DUE TO RMF ABEND WHILE SAMPLING r782shra 4 1: SHARED VALUES ABOVE 2G AVAILABLE (z/OS V1R5 or above)

item.title: Field - r782fls
item.description: FLPA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782FLS

item.title: Field - r782glch
item.description: 1: GETMAIN LIMIT CHANGED DURING INTERVAL Map: R782PVT Based on: r782flgs Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r782flgs.

item.title: Field - r782gmla
item.description: GETMAIN LIMIT ABOVE 16M (BYTES) Map: R782PVT Based on: R782GMLA

item.title: Field - r782gmlb
item.description: GETMAIN LIMIT BELOW 16M (BYTES) Map: R782PVT Based on: R782GMLB

item.title: Field - r782invl
item.description: 1: DATA INVALID DUE TO RMF ABEND WHILE SAMPLING Map: R782PVT Based on: r782flgs Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r782flgs.

item.title: Field - r782jobn
item.description: NAME OF JOB BEING MONITORED Map: R782PVT Based on: R782JOBN

item.title: Field - r782lpai
item.description: INTERMODULE SPACE IN LPA Map: R782COMN Based on: R782LPAI

item.title: Field - r782meml
item.description: Address space memory limit (in MB) Map: R782PVT Based on: R782MEML

item.title: Field - r782mla
item.description: MLPA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782MLA

item.title: Field - r782mls
item.description: MLPA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782MLS

item.title: Field - r782mr
item.description: MAXIMUM USER REGION BELOW 16M Map: R782COMN Based on: R782MR

item.title: Field - r782na
item.description: NUCLEUS ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782NA

item.title: Field - r782nl
item.description: NON-ACCESSIBLE PLPA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782NL

item.title: Field - r782ns
item.description: NUCLEUS SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782NS

item.title: Field - r782pa
item.description: PRIVATE AREA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782PA

item.title: Field - r782pgmn
item.description: PROGRAM NAME OF JOB BEING MONITORED Map: R782PVT Based on: R782PGMN

item.title: Field - r782pla
item.description: PLPA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782PLA

item.title: Field - r782pls
item.description: PLPA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782PLS

item.title: Field - r782ps
item.description: PRIVATE AREA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782PS

item.title: Field - r782rddt
item.description: READER START DATE Map: R782PVT Based on: R782RDDT

item.title: Field - r782rdtm
item.description: READER START TIME Map: R782PVT Based on: R782RDTM

item.title: Field - r782regr
item.description: REGION REQUESTED BY JCL (BYTES) Map: R782PVT Based on: R782REGR

item.title: Field - r782rgaa
item.description: ABOVE 16M REGION ASSIGNED BY EXITS (BYTES) Map: R782PVT Based on: R782RGAA

item.title: Field - r782rgab
item.description: BELOW 16M REGION ASSIGNED BY EXITS (BYTES) Map: R782PVT Based on: R782RGAB

item.title: Field - r782ruca
item.description: RUCSA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782RUCA

item.title: Field - r782rucd
item.description: =1 Restricted Use CSA (RUCSA) is defined Map: R782COMN Based on: r782flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r782flg.

item.title: Field - r782rucs
item.description: RUCSA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782RUCS

item.title: Field - r782sa
item.description: SQA ADDRESS Map: R782COMN Based on: R782SA

item.title: Field - r782samp
item.description: NUMBER OF SAMPLES Map: R782PVT Based on: R782SAMP

item.title: Field - r782shra
item.description: 1: SHARED VALUES ABOVE 2G AVAILABLE (z/OS V1R5 or above) Map: R782PVT Based on: r782flgs Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r782flgs.

item.title: Field - r782spn
item.description: SUBPOOL NUMBER Map: R782PVSP Based on: R782SPN

item.title: Field - r782ss
item.description: SQA SIZE Map: R782COMN Based on: R782SS

item.title: Field - r782step
item.description: NAME OF STEP ACTIVE WHEN MONITORING BEGAN Map: R782PVT Based on: R782STEP

item.title: Field - r782subi
item.description: INDEX OF FIRST SUBPOOL ENTRY (R782PVSP) FOR THIS JOB Map: R782PVT Based on: R782SUBI

item.title: Field - r782subn
item.description: INDEX OF LAST SUBPOOL ENTRY FOR THIS JOB Map: R782PVT Based on: R782SUBN

item.title: Field - r782term
item.description: 1: JOB TERMINATED DURING INTERVAL Map: R782PVT Based on: r782flgs Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r782flgs.

item.title: Field - r782uraa
item.description: USER REGION ADDRESS (above 16M) Map: R782PVT Based on: R782URAA

item.title: Field - r782urab
item.description: USER REGION ADDRESS (below 16M) Map: R782PVT Based on: R782URAB

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78RAO

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF78PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF78S2 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78SAM

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78SID

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78SNM

item.title: Field - spn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA SECTIONS Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78SPN

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF78S2 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78SYN

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF78S2 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78TME

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF78S2 Based on: SMF78TRN

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF78S2 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vsdamax
item.description: MAXIMUM VALUE FOR ABOVE 16M Map: VSDAT Based on: VSDAMAX

item.title: Field - vsdamin
item.description: MINIMUM VALUE FOR ABOVE 16M Map: VSDAT Based on: VSDAMIN

item.title: Field - vsdantme
item.description: TIME STAMP FOR MINIMUM VALUE Map: VSDAT Based on: VSDANTME

item.title: Field - vsdatotl
item.description: RUNNING TOTAL FOR ALL SAMPLES ABOVE 16M, IN FLOATING POINT Map: VSDAT Based on: VSDATOTL

item.title: Field - vsdaxtme
item.description: TIME STAMP FOR MAXIMUM VALUE Map: VSDAT Based on: VSDAXTME

item.title: Field - vsdbmax
item.description: MAXIMUM VALUE FOR BELOW 16M Map: VSDAT Based on: VSDBMAX

item.title: Field - vsdbmin
item.description: MINIMUM VALUE FOR BELOW 16M Map: VSDAT Based on: VSDBMIN

item.title: Field - vsdbntme
item.description: TIME STAMP FOR MINIMUM VALUE Map: VSDAT Based on: VSDBNTME

item.title: Field - vsdbtotl
item.description: RUNNING TOTAL FOR ALL SAMPLES BELOW 16M, IN FLOATING POINT Map: VSDAT Based on: VSDBTOTL

item.title: Field - vsdbxtme
item.description: TIME STAMP FOR MAXIMUM VALUE Map: VSDAT Based on: VSDBXTME

item.title: Field - vsdcmax
item.description: MAX VALUE Map: R782GFFR Based on: VSDCMAX

item.title: Field - vsdcmin
item.description: MIN VALUE Map: R782GFFR Based on: VSDCMIN

item.title: Field - vsdcntme
item.description: TIMESTAMP FOR MIN VALUE Map: R782GFFR Based on: VSDCNTME

item.title: Field - vsdctotl
item.description: TOTAL FOR ALL SAMPLES Map: R782GFFR Based on: VSDCTOTL

item.title: Field - vsdcxtme
item.description: TIMESTAMP FOR MAX VALUE Map: R782GFFR Based on: VSDCXTME

item.title: Field - vsdghwm
item.description: HIGH MARK ABOVE 2G Map: R782COBY Based on: VSDGHWM

item.title: Field - vsdgmax
item.description: MAX VALUE FOR ABOVE 2G Map: R782COBY Based on: VSDGMAX

item.title: Field - vsdgmin
item.description: MIN VALUE FOR ABOVE 2G Map: R782COBY Based on: VSDGMIN

item.title: Field - vsdgntme
item.description: TIMESTAMP FOR MIN VALUE Map: R782COBY Based on: VSDGNTME

item.title: Field - vsdgtotl
item.description: TOTAL FOR ALL SAMPLES Map: R782COBY Based on: VSDGTOTL

item.title: Field - vsdgxtme
item.description: TIMESTAMP FOR MAX VALUE Map: R782COBY Based on: VSDGXTME

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF78S2 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF78PRO Based on: SMF78XNM
